scripts.clean: lerna exec -- rm -rf assets examples lib LICENSE README.md && lerna clean
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update Docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push https://$GITHUB_USER:$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/jumpsuit/jumpsuit.git gh-pages --force
scripts.docs:ci: if [ '$TRAVIS_BRANCH' == 'master' ] && [ '$TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST' == 'false']; then npm run docs:publish; fi;
